snippet: Prime Minister Emil Boc is the latest European leader to fall victim to a mood of public outrage over austerity measures and stagnant growth.
abstract: Prime Minister Emil Boc of Romania says he is stepping down to help country have stability; he is the latest European leader to fall victim to a mood of public outrage over austerity measures and stagnant growth.

byline.contributor: Mihai Radu contributed reporting from Bucharest, Romania.

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Emil Boc is the latest European leader to fall victim to a mood of public outrage over austerity measures and stagnant growth.

headline.seo: Emil Boc, Romanian Prime Minister, Resigns Amid Protests
headline.main: Romanian Prime Minister Resigns Amid Protests
headline.print_headline: Premier Quits In Romania Amid Outcry Over Austerity
